Select a State / Region
{{vm.regionService.selectedRegion.Name}}

Start Here

To begin, a state or region needs to be selected. This can be accomplished in the following ways:

  • Click a state or region on the map
  • Zoom using the map until state region selection options appear below
  • Use the search box to zoom to an area of interest, then use the state selection buttons that will appear below
Identify a Study Area
Basin Delineated

Zoom to at least a zoom level of 15, click the 'delineate' button, then select a blue stream cell
